node.title: 2. The Eternity of Christ
node.description: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost be with you all. (2 Cor. 13: 14). Blessed be the LORD God of Israel from everlasting, and to everlasting. (Psalm 41: 13). Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre. (Psalm 45: 6).
